class analysis.loader.Loader(data_dir: str = 'data', extra_dir: str = 'extra', image_dir: str = 'images')¶

get_subjects(subjects: List[str]) → List[Subject]¶

Get a list of Subject objects based on the provided subject names.

Parameters:

subjects – A list of subject names.

Returns:

A list of Subject objects.

load(force: bool = False, learning: bool = False, image_file: str = 'maze1.png')¶

Load subjects, movements, and rotations data.

Parameters:

  • force – Whether to raise an exception if there are insufficient data files.

  • learning – Whether to include learning trials.

  • image_file – Name of the image file containing the maze.

sample_subject(n: int = 5) → List[Subject]¶

Randomly sample n subjects.

Parameters:

n – The number of subjects to sample.

Returns:

A list of sampled Subject objects.
